verses.text: \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* whom \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* thee, thy \w helper|strong="H5826"\w* \w from|strong="H0977"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*: \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou most righteous whom \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w out|strong="H3332"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirsty|strong="H6771"\w* \w ground|strong="H3004"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w streams|strong="H5140"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \w land|strong="H3004"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w out|strong="H3332"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy stock.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w spring|strong="H6779"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* herbs, \w as|strong="H4325"\w* \w willows|strong="H6155"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w running|strong="H2988"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w One|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lordâ€™s|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* subscribe \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w To|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* surname \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* brat, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w besides|strong="H1107"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*? \w let|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w let|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* before \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* order, \w since|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H0857"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* hereafter, \w let|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* shew unto \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H6342"\w* ye \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* ye troubled, \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w time|strong="H0227"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w declared|strong="H5046"\w*: \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H3426"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*. \w Is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w besides|strong="H1107"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w a|strong="H8085"\w* maker, whom \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* makers \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w idols|strong="H6459"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w nothing|strong="H8414"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* best beloved \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w nor|strong="H1077"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w may|strong="H4616"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w a|strong="H3335"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H6459"\w* \w made|strong="H3335"\w* \w a|strong="H3335"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* thing \w that|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w profitable|strong="H3276"\w* for \w nothing|strong="H1115"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* partakers thereof \w shall|strong="H0120"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*: \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* makers \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H0120"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w assemble|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H0120"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w fear|strong="H6342"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H0120"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1571"\w* \w smith|strong="H2796"\w* hath \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* file, \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w coals|strong="H6352"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w hammers|strong="H4717"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w it|strong="H3335"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* hath \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w strength|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w hunger|strong="H7456"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* faint, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w weary|strong="H3286"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5186"\w* carpenter hath \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w rule|strong="H3427"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath formed \w it|strong="H5186"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H5186"\w* plane: \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5186"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* corners, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* hath \w fashioned|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5186"\w* round \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* \w compass|strong="H4230"\w*: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* \w image|strong="H8403"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H5186"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w it|strong="H5186"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H5186"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H5186"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3947"\w* hath \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* holm, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w oak|strong="H0437"\w* that stood among \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*: \w he|strong="H3947"\w* hath \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* pine \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* hath nourished.

\w And|strong="H3899"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* hath \w served|strong="H1961"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w for|strong="H3899"\w* fuel: \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w warmed|strong="H2552"\w* \w himself|strong="H7812"\w*: \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* kindled \w it|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w baked|strong="H0644"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* adored \w it|strong="H1961"\w*: \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* thing, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* before \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* dressed \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w*: \w he|strong="H5921"\w* boiled pottage, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w was|strong="H1320"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w was|strong="H1320"\w* \w warmed|strong="H2552"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Aha|strong="H1889"\w*, \w I|strong="H7200"\w* am \w warm|strong="H2552"\w*, \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* residue thereof \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H6419"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w himself|strong="H7812"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* boweth \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H6419"\w* adoreth \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H6419"\w* prayeth unto \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w understood|strong="H0995"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* covered \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w consider|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H1847"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w baked|strong="H0644"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* thereof: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* broiled \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* residue thereof \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H0559"\w* \w idol|strong="H0944"\w*? \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w fall|strong="H5456"\w* \w down|strong="H5456"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* stock \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*?

Part thereof \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*: \w his|strong="H5186"\w* foolish \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* adoreth \w it|strong="H5186"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: Perhaps there \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H5186"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* thee, thou art \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w forget|strong="H5382"\w* \w me|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* blotted \w out|strong="H0413"\w* thy iniquities \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w mist|strong="H6051"\w*: \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* thee.
